summary: A violent massacre caused by human-sized mosquitoes forces the lone survivors to band together in a fight for survival as the mosquitoes continue their onslaught.
cast: Gunnar Hansen|Ron Asheton|Steve Dixon|Rachel Loiselle|Tim Lovelace|Mike Hard|Kenny Mugwump|Josh Becker|Margaret Gomoll|John Reneaud|Joel Hale|Guy Sanville|Patrick Butler|Patricia Kay Jones|Howard Brusseau Jr.|Steve Hodge|Ken Laplace|Bryan Jones|Erik Ball|Suzanne Bussard|Mark France|Kathleen Jones|Rebecca Jones|Victoria Swanwick|David Waszak
title: Mosquito
